FuncDef: This command sets the pace for update messages to and from theeth-cfmsubsystem to the QoS subsystem. The most recent update messages are held by the ETH-CFM subsystem, but the most recent update is held until the expiration of the pacing timer.

ParaDef.Info: The time to wait before sending subsequent updates (in seconds). Values-1 to 600. ParamDefault: Default- 5
